channel.title: [317] Changing level requirement on items
channel.description:
Hey all,
I'm having some trouble finding out how to change item requirements on items. Some of the items on my server (well, rares actually) all have a level requirement of 99 defence to wear. Ofcourse, i want this requirement gone. But i have no idea where and how. I check other threads for a solution, and they all point to wearing.java (or something, can't remember actually), but my source doesn't have a wearing file.
So, where could this little sucker be hiding?
Regards, SirPali

item.title: [317] Changing level requirement on items

@awa006 wrote:

what source do you have?

item.title: [317] Changing level requirement on items
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Thanks for your reply, but it’s not quite helpfull.
Like i said, my source doesn’t have a wearing.java file.

Where were the requirements saved before people started using wearing.java?

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Changing level requirement on items
item.dc:creator: @awa006 awa006
item.description:
@awa006 wrote:

go to wearing.java
And Search For

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Defence cape")) {

And Under That It Will Be

				return 99;

The ## Is Like 99 But You Can Change It To Like 110 Then You Compile and RunThe Server Wear A def Cape And Try whit a def level so is under 110 then it will say you need 110 defence to wear it
So Here Is My Example:

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Defence cape")) { return 110;
Anything Wrong Reply Here

Read full topic
